text:
is there a GPU compat way to take two arrays of different dims and multiply them along a compatible dimension?
E.g.
```x = randn((10, 5))
z = randn((100, 10, 10))
special_call(x, y; dim = 2) # => sizeof(...) = (100, 5, 10)```
